import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import BooksGrid from "./BooksGrid"; import SearchPage from "./SearchPage"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const books=[ { id:1, title: "Ender's Game", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], backgroundImage:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", bookState:"Read" }, { id:2, title: "to Kill a Mockingbird", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], backgroundImage:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", bookState:"Read" } , { id:3, title: "Amr", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], backgroundImage:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", bookState:"Read" } ] return (
{showSearchPage ? ( //
//
// setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} // > // Close // //
// //
//
//
//
    //
    //
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

    b.bookState=='Currently Reading')} /> {/*
    1. To Kill a Mockingbird
      Harper Lee
    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card
    */}

    Want to Read

    b.bookState=='Want to Read')} /> {/*
    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling
    */}

    Read

    b.bookState=='Read')} updateBookState={updateBookState} /> {/*
    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    */}
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
